SRI.K.I.ABDUL RASHEED, ADDL. PUBLIC PROSECUTOR R1 BY ADV. SRI.K.I.ABDUL RASHEEDADDL. PUBLIC PROSECUTOR R1 BY ADV. SMT.REKHA ARAVIND R1 BY ADV. SRI.SANTHARAM.P P.P.SMT.M.N.MAYA THIS CRIMINAL MISC. CASE HAVING BEEN FINALLY HEARD ON 11.01.2021, THE COURT ON THE SAME DAY PASSED THE FOLLOWING: Baers Tal Bae Cr1.MC.No.3004 OF 2015 2021/KER/1518 2 ORDER It is the case of the year 2015. Adv. Smt. Sheeja appeared on behalf of the counsel for the petitioners. The counsel for the petitioners remained absent. Farlier it was dismissed for default. It was restored and again came up for hearing. This would show what is behind it. Hence the Crl.M.C. is dismissed for non-prosecution. Sd/- P.
